name: Seismitoad
description: The vibrating of the bumps all over its body causes earthquake-like tremors. Seismitoad and Croagunk are similar species.

attacks.name: Split Spiral Punch
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Resonance
attacks.effect: If your opponent’s Active Pokémon is Confused, this attack does 120 more damage.
